metaTitle: LA SUNRISE F3 Jacarilla | Villas from €279,900
metaDescription: LA SUNRISE F3 in Jacarilla, Alicante. Luxury villas and townhouses from €279,900. GRUPO VISMELL development with golf, pool, delivery 2027.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to LA SUNRISE F3, an exceptional residential development by GRUPO VISMELL located in the prestigious Lo Serena Golf community in Jacarilla, Alicante. This premium project offers 8 carefully designed properties including villas, townhouses, bungalows, and apartments, with 2-3 bedrooms and modern specifications starting from €279,900. Nestled within one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after golf communities, LA SUNRISE F3 combines contemporary architecture with Mediterranean charm, providing the perfect lifestyle for discerning buyers seeking both investment potential and quality living. The development is scheduled for completion on 01-12-2027, offering a unique opportunity to own property in a mature, established area with excellent international amenities. Built to the highest standards by GRUPO VISMELL, each residence features modern finishes, private or communal pool access, and the tranquility of the golf resort setting. Whether you're seeking a second home, investment property, or permanent residence, LA SUNRISE F3 represents outstanding value in the thriving Jacarilla property market, where values have increased 8% year-on-year.

locationSection.intro: Lo Serena Golf in Jacarilla is one of Alicante's most prestigious residential destinations, offering a unique blend of world-class golf facilities, natural beauty, and cosmopolitan living. Situated on the southern Costa Blanca, Jacarilla benefits from year-round Mediterranean sunshine, established infrastructure, and a vibrant international community where English is widely spoken. The area attracts affluent buyers, golfers, and families seeking a balanced lifestyle combining leisure, investment security, and accessibility to major amenities. Lo Serena Golf stands out as a mature, well-developed resort with championship courses, quality restaurants, and boutique shopping. The location provides excellent value compared to other Spanish coastal markets, with property prices 40% less than island alternatives, while maintaining strong rental yields of €800 per week for vacation properties.
highlights: Beach: 20 minutes to multiple Blue Flag beaches
Golf: Several championship courses within resort
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining options within walking distance of resort

propertyFeatures.intro: LA SUNRISE F3 properties are constructed to exceptional standards by GRUPO VISMELL, featuring premium materials and contemporary design throughout. Each residence incorporates modern building techniques, energy-efficient systems, and high-quality finishes that ensure comfort and durability. The development reflects careful attention to Mediterranean architectural principles while delivering all conveniences expected by today's discerning buyers. With built sizes ranging from 67-136m² and plot sizes from 64-752m², properties offer flexible configurations suitable for various lifestyle needs and investment strategies.
features: Private and communal swimming pool facilities
Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Video entry system with security features

content.investmentSection: LA SUNRISE F3 represents a compelling investment opportunity in the Jacarilla property market, which demonstrates robust fundamentals and consistent growth. The area has experienced 8% year-on-year price appreciation, significantly outpacing inflation and providing strong capital growth potential. With nightly rental rates averaging €800 per week for vacation properties, LA SUNRISE F3 offers excellent income-generating capability for investors seeking portfolio diversification. The development's golf resort location attracts affluent international renters throughout the year, particularly during European winter months. Jacarilla's established international community, mature infrastructure, and proximity to Alicante airport combine to create sustained demand from both owner-occupiers and investors. Properties are priced 40% below comparable developments on Spanish islands, providing genuine value while maintaining strong market fundamentals. GRUPO VISMELL's reputation ensures quality construction and reliable project delivery, critical factors for investment security.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in LA SUNRISE F3?
faqs.answer: LA SUNRISE F3 properties start from €279,900. The development offers villas, townhouses, bungalows, and apartments with 2-3 bedrooms, with built sizes ranging from 67-136m². Specific pricing depends on property type, size, and current availability. We recommend contacting our sales team for detailed pricing on specific units.

faqs.question: When will LA SUNRISE F3 be completed?
faqs.answer: LA SUNRISE F3 is scheduled for completion on 01-12-2027. GRUPO VISMELL provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Staggered delivery phases may be available depending on the specific property. Contact us for delivery timelines specific to your preferred unit.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of LA SUNRISE F3?
faqs.answer: GRUPO VISMELL is the developer of LA SUNRISE F3. They have an established track record building quality residential developments throughout Jacarilla and surrounding areas, known for reliable project delivery and quality construction standards.

faqs.question: Is Jacarilla a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes. Jacarilla is an excellent location for property investment and residential living. The area features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making integration straightforward for foreign buyers. Property values show positive 8% year-on-year appreciation, and the location offers exceptional amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and several championship golf courses.

faqs.question: How far is LA SUNRISE F3 from the beach?
faqs.answer: LA SUNRISE F3 is approximately 20 minutes by car from multiple Blue Flag beaches. The Costa Blanca coastline offers diverse beach experiences, from family-friendly sandy coves to more exclusive coastal areas. Beach access is excellent for both leisure and vacation rental purposes.

faqs.question: What amenities are near LA SUNRISE F3?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Shopping - Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets; Healthcare - Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors; Golf - Several championship courses within the resort; Education - International schools in the region with British curriculum options; Transport - Bus connections available, car recommended for flexibility.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes. Non-EU citizens can purchase property in Spain without significant restrictions. You will need an NIE (tax identification number) and should work with a Spanish solicitor to navigate the purchasing process. Most buyers engage property specialists familiar with international transactions to ensure smooth completion.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Property purchase costs in Spain typically include: Transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), notary fees (0.5-1%), legal fees (1-2%), and registration fees (0.5-1%). For LA SUNRISE F3 in Alicante, Andalusia transfer tax applies. Total additional costs usually range 8-15% of purchase price. We recommend consulting with a property specialist for precise calculations.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential of LA SUNRISE F3?
faqs.answer: LA SUNRISE F3 properties offer strong rental income potential, with nightly rates averaging €800 per week during peak seasons. The golf resort location attracts international tourists and golfers year-round. Properties are equally suitable for owner-occupancy or vacation rental investment strategies.

content.conclusion: LA SUNRISE F3 represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire premium property in one of Costa Blanca's most established and desirable locations. With starting prices from €279,900, modern construction by GRUPO VISMELL, guaranteed completion in 2027, and the prestigious Lo Serena Golf setting, this development offers compelling value for owner-occupiers and investors alike. The combination of golf, beaches, international community amenities, and proven capital appreciation creates an ideal environment for long-term wealth building and quality lifestyle. Whether you seek a Mediterranean retreat, investment portfolio addition, or permanent residence, LA SUNRISE F3 delivers on all fronts. Contact us today via WhatsApp to arrange a private viewing, discuss specific unit availability, or obtain comprehensive information about this exceptional development. Our specialist team is ready to guide you through the entire purchasing process.
